name: XCTNSPredicateExpectation
desc: An expectation that is fulfilled when an NSPredicate is satisfied.

items.name: init(predicate: NSPredicate, object: Any?)
items.desc: Creates an expectation that is fulfilled when an NSPredicate instance returns true, optionally for a provided object.

items.name: var predicate: NSPredicate
items.desc: The predicate that is evaluated by the expectation.

items.name: var object: Any?
items.desc: An optional object against which the predicate is evaluated.

items.name: var handler: XCTNSPredicateExpectation.Handler?
items.desc: An optional handler that performs custom evaluation when predicate evaluates as true.

items.name: typealias XCTNSPredicateExpectation.Handler
items.desc: A handler to be called when evaluating the predicate returns true.
